ModMetaData.name: Cats!
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy (l2032)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds several breeds of domestic and wild cats to the game. Implemented are: Domestic Cats - Maine Coon - Miniature Maine Coon - European Shorthair - Norwegian Forest Cat - British Shorthair - Siamese (Huge thanks to Lokidemon!)
Wild Cats - Lion (Huge thanks to Lokidemon!)
